description: This table stores the authorizing provider audit trail for orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PROV_AUDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique user ID of the authorizing provider from the audit trail.

columns.name: PROV_AUDIT_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant that the associated authorizing provider was recorded in the order record.

columns.name: PROV_AUDIT_SER_ID
columns.description: The provider ID of the authorizing provider from the audit trail.

columns.name: PROV_AUDIT_POOL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for registry record representing the group of users who are responsible for a cosignature requirement on the order record.

columns.name: PROV_AUDIT_POOL_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: PROV_AUDIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of provider from the audit trail.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Authorizing Provider


Ordering Provider


Supervising Provider

columns.name: PROV_AUDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action from the audit trail.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Discontinue


Attending Assigned


Manual Correction


Order Signed


Order Pended


Update On Transfer
